name: Super Stacker
description:
Super Stacker is a game in which you compete to stack blocks and create the highest tower on a spinning platform base. Be careful, as you miss each block, the stack becomes more and more unstable

compete to create the tallest and best looking skyscraper ever!
◉ simple and beautiful graphics
◉ one-handed gameplay that's simple and engaging
◉ completely free forever
◉ ad-free and unintrusive forever

If you like it, we also have an Android version that you can take with you on the go, and that version utilizes Google Leaderboards as well. Same deal, completely free and completely add-free
